issues.title: Need to specify a reasonable timeframe for Sharing Request expiry
issues.author: wcai-biza

issues.title: Need a new actionStatus enum value between "PENDING" and "IN_PROGRESS"
issues.author: wcai-biza
issues.body:
An data sharing request cannot be reused after it has been submitted to PAR, therefore we need to move its status out of "PENDING". And it is technically not "IN_PROGRESS" either, because the `/authorize` flow has not started yet.

We need to introduce a new actionStatus enum value.

issues.title: Spec needs to suggest implementation to separate V1 and V2 sharing arrangement
issues.author: wcai-biza
issues.body: At this stage, we should suggest implementation to separate V1 and V2 sharing arrangement, e.g. a V1 arrangement, which was created without data sharing request, should not be amended by a V2 data sharing request.
